channel.title: Very dificult question- answer even if you dont know!
channel.description:
So.. I have a 508 now. I wantd to know if there's a way to make a certain player, have different rights when he sets into specific coords?
EX:
A person is at home. He is player rights 0. He decides to go to bounty hunter and I want him as a BH mod.
He enters and his rights changes to 0 untill he leaves bh. Any1 know? Thanks guys!

item.title: Very dificult question- answer even if you dont know!
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:5, topic:236678”][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=312392.msg2489349#msg2489349 date=1224018075]
umm… couldnt you add this in the bounty hunter handler… such as the name would = blah blah… player rights=1 if in cordx1 cordx2 cordy1 cordy2… and etc… and then when out side of those cords he gets =0…
[/quote]
Tried it. Nothing worked[/quote]
did u set it up right?
make it look like the cord 1 in the handler… then add 1 right below it just like that 1… and make it accept the username and make his rights 1 until he leaves bh

Read full topic
item.source: Very dificult question- answer even if you dont know!
